steps.name: And click on dropdown of one opportunity and check it is showing details or not
And get text of how many tasks and notes count
And create task and validate in activity area
And create note and validate in activity area
Then validate the task and note count is reflected or not in kanban view dropdown

fullName: checking in kanban view the count of tasks and notes showing correct: In kanban view click on dropdown of opportunity and checking that It is showing details

labels.value: checking in kanban view the count of tasks and notes showing correct
